ideas.heading: A good life can end in lonelyness and betrayal

subideas.text: As you might notice, Timothy was also imprisoned. The mention of Tymothy, plus the lack of Paul mentioning on the letter, plus the incredible difference in style and focus of this letter with Paul's letters, suggests me that maybe Paul is dead at this point, and that Tymothy persevered as instructed in 2 timothy

ideas.heading: The task of Christian Life is obedient perseverance event in the face of lonelyness
The Key to overcome lonellyness is true faith in our Savior

subideas.text: Our savior handled his lonelyness through his relationship with the Father
Although he was truly alone with respect to His disciples, the company of the Father sustained Him
This precense of the Father sustained Him event in the face of the profound grief for Juda's betrayal. As we reed on John 13:
There is a sense, in which His relationship with the Father was like ours
He even had to fight his thoughts and emotions trough relentless prayer to endure
This is the secret. Those who really love him through obedience will trust and follow Him through fire
But please, dont let that your lifestyle fool you. We dont love Jesus because we dont commit publicly repudiated sins
We love Him because we obey Him
We know that we love Him when we truly lay down our life in concrete actions to build up our brothers
Besides from this, our faith is dead

ideas.heading: We must embrace our eclesiastical duties until the end like our Lord and faith forefathers did
